## Summary

## Type
- [ ] feature
- [ ] fix
- [ ] hotfix
- [ ] release
- [ ] docs/chore

## How to test
- [ ] `bun run lint`
- [ ] `bun run typecheck`
- [ ] `bun run test`
- [ ] (optional) `RUN_INTEGRATION=true bun --filter @app/users test`
- [ ] (optional) `RUN_INTEGRATION=true bun --filter @app/wallet test`

## Checklist
- [ ] Breaking changes called out (API/DB/schema)
- [ ] Migrations included (if needed)
- [ ] OpenAPI specs updated (if routes/DTOs changed)
- [ ] Docs updated (`README.md`, `services/*/README.md`)
- [ ] No secrets logged

## Review
Reference: `docs/code-review.md`
